movies.title: Hawa
movies.overview: A mysterious thriller about fishermen who encounter something supernatural at sea. One of Bangladesh's most celebrated films of 2022.

movies.title: Karagar
movies.overview: A prisoner appears in Akashnagar Central Jail's Cell No.145, which has been shut for 50 years, and claims immortality. Who is this mystery man, and  what secrets does he hold inside him?

movies.title: Mohanagar
movies.overview: One fateful night, a police station in Bangladesh, and a motley crowd consisting of criminals, an eminent industrialist, media, general public. What does this night have in store for them?

movies.title: Taqdeer
movies.overview: The plot of the series revolves arounds a story of a freezer van driver in Dhaka named Taqdeer (played by Chanchal Chowdhury) whose whole life turns upside down when he finds a dead body inside his van. A trail of chaotic events thereby follows which pushes Taqdeer and his best friend Montu (played by Shohel Mondol) into bigger difficulties

movies.title: Debi
movies.overview: A supernatural mystery based on Humayun Ahmed's novel. A landmark in Bangladeshi supernatural cinema.

movies.title: Shonibar Bikel
movies.overview: A raw harrowing account of the 2016 Holey Artisan Cafe terrorist attack — Bangladesh's most powerful film.

movies.title: Aynabaji
movies.overview: A struggling actor turns his chameleon-like talent for assuming different identities into a profitable business, substituting for convicted criminals in jail.

movies.title: Surongo
movies.overview: An electrician makes a meticulous plan to rob a bank by digging a tunnel in a desperate attempt to win back his unfaithful wife.

movies.title: 28 Years Later: The Bone Temple
movies.overview: Dr. Kelson finds himself in a shocking new relationship - with consequences that could change the world as they know it - and Spike's encounter with Jimmy Crystal becomes a nightmare he can't escape.

movies.title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
movies.original_title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
movies.overview: A century before the events of Game of Thrones, two unlikely heroes wandered Westeros: a young, naive but courageous knight, Ser Duncan the Tall, and his diminutive squire, Egg. Set in an age when the Targaryen line still holds the Iron Throne and the last dragon has not yet passed from living memory, great destinies, powerful foes, and dangerous exploits await these improbable and incomparable friends.

movies.title: Ghare & Baire
movies.overview: Amit, a Bangla band musician, halts his bohemian dreams of making music in Kolkata, to exile himself to corporate slavery in Mumbai hoping to one day declare his feelings for his best friend Labonya.

movies.title: Bibaho Diaries
movies.overview: Bibaho Diaries is a romantic comedy about what a couple today looks like under a microscope before and after marriage - an account of all the hilarious things that bind them together and ...

movies.title: The Lady Thug
movies.overview: Thagini (The Lady Thug) is a Bengali suspense drama film directed by Tarun Majumdar based on a short story of Subodh Ghosh. This film was released on 13 December 1974 in the banner of Chaya O Chabi Production. Music of the film was scored by Hemanta Mukherjee.

movies.title: Tiktiki
movies.overview: Satyasindhu writes detective stories and is strangely obsessed with dangerous make-believe games. In his young wife’s absence, he invites her lover Bimal and forces him to play a pretence game of theft. These games become a challenge and duel between the two men, each of whom seek to be the victor. What follows is yet another dangerous suspense plot with a twist. Based on Sleuth, the famous 1970 play by Anthony Shaffer.

movies.title: Angaar
movies.overview: In a village where love is punishable by death, two individuals dare to fall in love despite their knowledge of the outcome.

movies.title: Fuleswari
movies.overview: Fuleshwari, a beautiful young woman, falls in love with Brindaban, a simpleton who arrives in her village. She plans to marry him but is hesitant when she learns that he is involved in a crime.

movies.title: Daughter of the Sun
movies.overview: A jobless imaginative artist finds his fantasies when a sculpture he creates comes to life every night.

movies.title: Bombaiyer Bombete
movies.overview: Lalmohan Ganguly, alias Jatayu − a sidekick of Feluda − gets invited to Mumbai (previously Bombay) to watch the shooting of a film based on a novel written by him. Once in Mumbai, he, along with Feluda and Topshe gets embroiled with underworld kingpins. He seems to have transported the Nana Sahib's necklace. But fortunately because of Feluda the real thief is caught and convicted.  Although the original story was written in the 1970s, the movie is set in more recent times and depict the real problem of underworld involvement in Bollywood.

movies.title: Bumper
movies.overview: a short film my actor Rwitobroto Mukherjee

movies.title: Gorosthane Sabdhan
movies.overview: By accident, more than anything else, the three find themselves beside the grave of Thomas Godwin. The grave was dug up by some miscreants for unknown reasons. The rather colorful history of Mr. Godwin makes Feluda curious to know more about the man.From the diary of Thomas' daughter Charlotte, Feluda finds that a very precious clock went to Thomas' grave with him. To his surprise, Feluda finds that another party knows about this clock and they are trying to get it aided by the letter with them. Thanks to the brilliance of the detective and the help of 'Haripodobabu', the chauffeur of Mr. Ganguli, a new introduction in this book, their plot is foiled.

movies.title: The Cart
movies.overview: This is the story of the indomitable dream of two young brothers and their incredible journey in life and their car that has never been defeated. The story of human spirit, sufferings and simple joy.

movies.title: Palanka
movies.overview: Rajmohan remains in Pakistan at the time of partition and sells Maqbool a giant bed, which upsets the local Muslims.

movies.title: Hello Memsaheb
movies.overview: A man disguises as a servant to stay close to a woman he loves.  Directors: Shiboprosad Mukherjee, Nandita Roy  Writers: Shiboprosad Mukherjee, Nandita Roy  Stars: Jeet, Priyanka Upendra, Koneenica Banerjee | See full cast & crew »

movies.title: MR-9: Do or Die
movies.overview: Elite Bangladeshi CIA agent Masud Rana – codename MR-9 – teams up with an American CIA operative to bring down an international criminal organization headed by a ruthless businessman.

movies.title: Nolok
movies.overview: An 2019 Bangladeshi romantic comedy film directed by Sakib Sonet.

movies.title: Naxal
movies.overview: After nearly 42 years one fine morning a FAX arrives at the Kolkata Metro Railways Headquarters. It says that today Anirban will commit suicide under the last Metro. Questions regarding his identity and demands start emerging as the news has taken centre stage in the city. This news shake the entire city from Kolkata Police Headquarters (Lalbazar) to the news channels, while Anirban rattles the administration with one FAX after the other.

movies.title: Mastram
movies.overview: Rajaram is a small town bank clerk who dreams of travelling to Delhi and becoming a reputed writer. His litterateur aspirations are supported by none except his wife Renu.

movies.title: Mahulbanir Sereng
movies.overview: The story of Mahulbanir Sereng is a narrative revolving around the triangular love story of Aghore (Pijush Ganguly), with his wife Saheli (Chandrayee Ghosh) and Dr. Alaktak Roy (Shilajeet Majumdar). Aghore is a police constable who works in a different place so he often stays out of hometown, in the mean time his wife Saheli gets closer with the new young doctor of their village.

movies.title: Shob Bhooturey
movies.overview: Aniket (Abir) and the editor of his late father’s horror magazine, Kripadhar Babu (Supriyo), visit an eerie little village called Kushumpur with their mysterious companion Nandini (Sohini) to discover the sad truth about a haunted school there.

movies.title: Bachelor Point
movies.overview: Four young men from different districts of Bangladesh encounter various challenges as they try to live an independent life in the city, Dhaka.

movies.title: Housefull
movies.overview: Bangladeshi dramaserial in an urban setting of the modern Dhaka, depicting colourful and interesting lifestyles of some families living in Dhaka. The typical Bangladeshi family and their personal lives make this house so full.

movies.title: Harkipte
movies.overview: Harkipte is a very popular television serial written by Brindaban Das and directed by Salahuddin Lovelu. Amirul Haque Chowdhury, Chanchal Chowdhury, Mosharraf Karim, AK M Hasan, Shamim Zaman, Shahnaz Khushi and many others acted in the main roles.

movies.title: Bachelor Point (Season 5)
movies.overview: Bachelor Point season 5 will follow the ongoing story of the bachelors, potentially exploring new challenges and relationships.

movies.title: Sakin Sarisuri
movies.overview: Sakin Sarisuri, also known as Shakin Sharishuri, is a Bangladeshi telenovela written by Brindabon Das and directed by Salauddin Lavlu. The 106-episode telenovela started airing on Channel i on January 27, 2009, and has yet to finish.

movies.title: Pett Kata Shaw
movies.overview: Pett Kata Shaw takes the darkest most nefarious Bengali folk tales that survived generations and gives them a modern twist. Our stories and our culture must live on. Ghost stories too.

movies.title: Rumi
movies.overview: Rumi, a CIB officer, loses his sight and his job in a near-fatal accident. He starts having nightmares of strange events, one of which shockingly translates to reality in a gruesome murder. Now, the blind detective must decipher his nightmares to unravel the mystery behind the violent crime!

movies.title: Bohemian Ghora
movies.overview: Abbas is a truck driver with 7 secret wives across Bangladesh! He thinks wife number 8 will bring bad luck. But when he falls for clever, fun-loving Sundori, things go wild—with a drul deal gone wrong, and crooks, chaos, and cops chasing him! Can Abbas handle one more wife or, will she handle him?

movies.title: Ladies and Gentlemen
movies.overview: Follow the emotional journey of Sabila, an ordinary girl, who becomes the voice of every working woman in Bangladesh and beyond. The show highlights the complexity of male-female dynamics and hierarchical exploitations and misogyny.

movies.title: Myself Allen Swapan
movies.overview: Year 2018, Cox's Bazar. Government's anti-narcotic raid is underway with great intensity. News spreads that the infamous drug dealer, Allen Swapan, is killed in a crossfire. Meanwhile, someone resembling him, going by the name of Shamsur Rahman, appears in Dhaka city. Who is this Shamsur Rahman?

movies.title: Bohubrihi
movies.overview: A TV adaptation of the famous novel with the same name by Humayun Ahmed, focusing on Mr. Sobhan and his family.

movies.title: Adhunik Bangla Hotel
movies.overview: Discover the enchanting world of Adhunik Bangla Hotel, an anthology series that serves up a tantalizing array of authentic Bangla cuisine infused with fantasy, psychological horror and mythology, where each story unveils a new dish that will leave you craving for more.

movies.title: Golam Mamun
movies.overview: Mamun, the prime suspect in a double murder, faces off with a serial killer and the system to which he has dedicated his life, while the clock keeps ticking on his quest to prove his innocence.

movies.title: Boli
movies.overview: In the lawless island of Chedadiya, the ruthless Sohrab is in pursuit of absolute power. But Rustom, a stranger who has arrived there by a stroke of luck, seems to be in his way. How will this disastrous conflict culminate, and will Chedadiya ever escape the cycle of violence?

movies.title: Gulmohor
movies.overview: When a family gets together to divide their inheritance after their father’s death, a child gets kidnaped and the ransom asked is equal to the sum of their inheritance. The crisis unearths shadowy secrets, simmering conflicts, and shocking truths which were buried behind the family’s public image.

movies.title: Kaalpurush
movies.overview: Detective Miraj unravels a twisted murder case, intertwining with an old one, revealing a surreal truth that challenges his sanity.

reviews.body: This was a decent timepass movie.
